headline: The Bull Case For Edison International (EIX) Could Change Following $1.66 Billion Preferred Stock Buyback – Learn Why
summary: Earlier this month, Edison International initiated cash tender offers to repurchase all outstanding Series A and Series B Preferred Stock, with a combined aggregate liquidation preference exceeding US$1.66 billion, offering holders their full liquidation value or close to it plus accrued dividends. This move demonstrates Edison International's focus on capital management and confidence in liquidity, occurring alongside its recent third-quarter earnings beat and guidance update. We'll explore...
